head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MURNAGHAN, FRANCIS D. JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MURNAGHAN, FRANCIS D. JR.

block.p: MURNAGHAN-Francis D. Jr. On August 31, 2000. Husband of Diana Edwards Murnaghan; father of Sheila, George, and Janet Murnaghan, Mark and Daria Maneche. Father-in-law of Hugh Gordon, Elizabeth Chen and Alan Feinberg; brother of Patricia Robertson. A memorial service will be held at Walters Art Gallery on Wednesday September 6 at 5pm. Memorial contributions may be made to the Walters Art Gallery, 5 West Mt. Vernon Place, Baltimore, MD 21201.
